Getting Started CoActionOS User Guide

Buy Hardware

Buy the CoAction Hero (easiest way to get started). Or you can install CoActionOS on the mbed LPC1768 platform.

Install Eclipse IDE

The Eclipse IDE is used for editing and building CoActionOS applications. You can download the Eclipse IDE for free.

Install the SDK

To build and install applications on CoActionOS, you will need to get the software.

Build and Install Your First Application

Read the CoActionOS Tutorial.
